Package characters

Class Pikimon

java.lang.Object
characters.Pikimon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Articuna, Ash, Bobblesaur, Chormander, Darnitan, Detto, Elekidding, FireChicken, Goblin, Jigglypoff, MainInventory, Ninetails, Pikacho, Snorex, Squortle, Stinkfisk, Sudowood, Sus, Venasaur, Wailmore
public abstract class Pikimon extends Object
This class implements a Pikimon and their associated attributes.
Author:
Jaymee Chen
